org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

Class ThreadBoundReactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ReactorBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.ThreadBoundReactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, Blade, ThreadBoundBlade, Closeable, CommonReactor, Reactor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingBoundReactor

    public class ThreadBoundReactor
extends ReactorBase
implements CommonReactor, java.lang.Runnable, ThreadBoundBlade
    A reactor bound to a pre-existing thread.

    Requests/responses are processed one at a time in the order received, except that requests/responses from the same reactor are given preference.

    Requests/responses destined to a different reactor are held until all incoming messages have been processed.
